testcase.name: Purchasing the product via Etsy India Pvt Ltd.
testcase.system-out: Given I am at the Etsy Login Page,I entered my User Name "ravi.shekhar082@gmail.com" Password "IVAR092".passed And Click the Login btn.....................................................passed And I entered the product name "iPhoneCase" in the search box...............passed And click the search button.................................................passed When I select the product and add it into my cart...........................passed And I confirm my product and proceed to checkout page.......................passed Then I enter my Delivery Address "Ravi","Delhi","Rohini","110009","Delhi"...passed And I move to payment page and enter my credit card details "Ravi","1254785654","5847"..passed
